text: Public and residents of Maniyan island Kaliamman temple street near here rescued a spotted deer that was chased and bitten by stray dogs and handed over the animal to Forest Department personnel. Local people said the deer had wandered from the Kodiyakkarai Wildlife Sanctuary into the residential area of the Maniyan Island when the dogs chased and bit the animal's legs. Hearing the animal’s cries and commotion, residents came out and chased away the dogs.
title: Deer rescued
